bcmConfTable.name: bcmConfTable
bcmConfTable.description: This table contains configuration values for the broadcast management functions of a BUS. It is an extension to the busConfTable.

bcmConfEntry.name: bcmConfEntry
bcmConfEntry.description: Each entry in this table represents an extension of a corresponding enty in the busConfTable.

bcmRouteCacheEnabled.name: bcmRouteCacheEnabled
bcmRouteCacheEnabled.description: When 'true', the BCM will cache routes. When 'false', it will not.

bcmStaticTargetsNextId.name: bcmStaticTargetsNextId
bcmStaticTargetsNextId.description: The next available index in the bcmStaticTargetsTable. The value of this object can be used as the index by the network manager to create an entry in the table. Note: since the bcmStaticTargetsTable is statically defined, by the MSS agent this object has no meaning. This object always has a value of 1. The agent statically defines three rows in this table and sets rowStatus based on initial configuration.

bcmStaticTargetsTable.name: bcmStaticTargetsTable
bcmStaticTargetsTable.description: This table contains static broadcast target addresses for all the BCMs at this agent. Each BCM may have multiple entries. Object bcmStaticTargetsRowStatus is required during row creation and deletion.

bcmStaticTargetsEntry.name: bcmStaticTargetsEntry
bcmStaticTargetsEntry.description: Each entry in this table defines a broadcast target address for a BCM.

bcmStaticTargetsIndex.name: bcmStaticTargetsIndex
bcmStaticTargetsIndex.description: A value which uniquely identifies a conceptual row in the bcmStaticTargetsTable.

bcmStaticTargetsAtmAddress.name: bcmStaticTargetsAtmAddress
bcmStaticTargetsAtmAddress.description: The ATM address of the static broadcast target.

bcmStaticTargetsMacAddress.name: bcmStaticTargetsMacAddress
bcmStaticTargetsMacAddress.description: The MAC address of the static broadcast target. This object is optional.

bcmStaticTargetsProtocol.name: bcmStaticTargetsProtocol
bcmStaticTargetsProtocol.description: The protocol designation for static broadcast target. Indicates for which protocol broadcast frames are forwarded. Currently, only IPX is supported (i.e., configured static entries only apply to IPX).

bcmStaticTargetsRowStatus.name: bcmStaticTargetsRowStatus
bcmStaticTargetsRowStatus.reference: RFC1903, Textual Conventions for version 2 of the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMPv2).
bcmStaticTargetsRowStatus.description: This object is used to create or activate and inactivate entries in the bcmStaticTargetsTable. Note: in order to set RowStatus active bcmStaticTargetsProtocol and bcmStaticTargetsAtmAddress must be set to in the same SET bindings. If the optional object bcmStaticTargetsMacAddress is desired it must also be SET in the same bindings. Once the RowStatus is set to active, objects maybe individually set. Only values of active(1) and inActive(2) are supported for this table.

bcmIpConfTable.name: bcmIpConfTable
bcmIpConfTable.description: This table contains configuration parameters for the IP protocol for the BCMs at the agent. This table augments the bcmConfTable.

bcmIpConfEntry.name: bcmIpConfEntry
bcmIpConfEntry.description: Each entry in this table represents the configuration for the IP protocol of a single BCM.

bcmIpConfOperStatus.name: bcmIpConfOperStatus
bcmIpConfOperStatus.description: The operational state of BCM/IP on this entry. Other defines the transition states between up and down.

bcmIpConfAdminStatus.name: bcmIpConfAdminStatus
bcmIpConfAdminStatus.description: The administrative state of the BCM/IP on this entry.

bcmIpConfCacheAge.name: bcmIpConfCacheAge
bcmIpConfCacheAge.description: The maximum number of minutes an IP Address entry is kept without re-verification of its location.

bcmIpxConfTable.name: bcmIpxConfTable
bcmIpxConfTable.description: This table contains configuration parameters for the IPX protocol for the BCMs at the agent. This table augments the bcmConfTable.

bcmIpxConfEntry.name: bcmIpxConfEntry
bcmIpxConfEntry.description: Each entry in this table represents the configuration for the IPX protocol of a single BCM.

bcmIpxConfOperStatus.name: bcmIpxConfOperStatus
bcmIpxConfOperStatus.description: The operational state of BCM/IPX on this entry. Other defines the transition states between up and down.

bcmIpxConfAdminStatus.name: bcmIpxConfAdminStatus
bcmIpxConfAdminStatus.description: The administrative state of the BCM/IPX on this entry.

bcmIpxConfCacheAge.name: bcmIpxConfCacheAge
bcmIpxConfCacheAge.description: The maximum number of minutes an IPX Address entry is kept without re-verification of its location.

bcmNbConfTable.name: bcmNbConfTable
bcmNbConfTable.description: This table contains configuration parameters for the NetBIOS protocol for the BCMs at the agent. This table augments the bcmConfTable.

bcmNbConfEntry.name: bcmNbConfEntry
bcmNbConfEntry.description: Each entry in this table represents the configuration for the NetBIOS protocol of a single BCM.

bcmNbConfOperStatus.name: bcmNbConfOperStatus
bcmNbConfOperStatus.description: The operational state of BCM/NetBIOS on this entry. Other defines the transition states between up and down.

bcmNbConfAdminStatus.name: bcmNbConfAdminStatus
bcmNbConfAdminStatus.description: The administrative state of the BCM/NetBIOS on this entry.

bcmNbConfCacheAge.name: bcmNbConfCacheAge
bcmNbConfCacheAge.description: The maximum number of minutes an NetBIOS Address entry is kept without re-verification of its location.

bcmStatTable.name: bcmStatTable
bcmStatTable.description: This table contains all the counters maintained by the BCMs within the scope of an agent. This table augments the bcmConfTable.

bcmStatEntry.name: bcmStatEntry
bcmStatEntry.description: Each entry in this table contains a BCM and its counters. These counters accumulate totals for all protocols.

bcmFramesReceived.name: bcmFramesReceived
bcmFramesReceived.description: Total number of frames received by BCM for all protocols.

bcmOctetsReceived.name: bcmOctetsReceived
bcmOctetsReceived.description: Total number of octets received by BCM for all protocols.

bcmFramesReturned.name: bcmFramesReturned
bcmFramesReturned.description: Total number of frames, for all protocols, not managed by BCM and returned to BUS for transmission.

bcmOctetsReturned.name: bcmOctetsReturned
bcmOctetsReturned.description: Total number of octets, for all protocols, not managed by BCM and returned to BUS for transmission.

bcmFramesDiscarded.name: bcmFramesDiscarded
bcmFramesDiscarded.description: Total number of frames discarded (filtered) by BCM for all protocols.

bcmOctetsDiscarded.name: bcmOctetsDiscarded
bcmOctetsDiscarded.description: Total number of octets discarded (filtered) by BCM for all protocols.

bcmFramesTransmitted.name: bcmFramesTransmitted
bcmFramesTransmitted.description: Total number of frames transmitted by BCM for all protocols.

bcmOctetsTransmitted.name: bcmOctetsTransmitted
bcmOctetsTransmitted.description: Total number of octets transmitted by BCM for all protocols.

bcmTransmitErrorFrames.name: bcmTransmitErrorFrames
bcmTransmitErrorFrames.description: Total number of frames, for all protocols, that the BCM could not sent due to an error.

bcmTransmitErrorOctets.name: bcmTransmitErrorOctets
bcmTransmitErrorOctets.description: Total number of octets, for all protocols, that the BCM could not sent due to an error.

bcmBroadcastFramesDirectedNoRif.name: bcmBroadcastFramesDirectedNoRif
bcmBroadcastFramesDirectedNoRif.description: Total number of frames, for all protocols, transmitted by BCM with no RI Field.

bcmBroadcastFramesDirectedAre.name: bcmBroadcastFramesDirectedAre
bcmBroadcastFramesDirectedAre.description: Total number of frames, for all protocols, transmitted by BCM left as ARE.

bcmBroadcastFramesDirectedSte.name: bcmBroadcastFramesDirectedSte
bcmBroadcastFramesDirectedSte.description: Total number of frames, for all protocols, transmitted by BCM that were converted from ARE or STE to SRF by Source Route Management, or left as SRF multicast frame (a rare frame type).

bcmBroadcastFramesDirectedSrf.name: bcmBroadcastFramesDirectedSrf
bcmBroadcastFramesDirectedSrf.description: Frames sent on one VCC, changed to SRF.

bcmIpStatTable.name: bcmIpStatTable
bcmIpStatTable.description: Each entry in this table contains the counters for the IP operation of a BCM. The table augments the bcmStatTable.

bcmIpStatEntry.name: bcmIpStatEntry
bcmIpStatEntry.description: Each entry in this table contains the counters for the IP operation of a BCM. The table augments the bcmStatTable.

bcmIpFramesReceived.name: bcmIpFramesReceived
bcmIpFramesReceived.description: Number of (IP) frames received by BCM.

bcmIpOctetsReceived.name: bcmIpOctetsReceived
bcmIpOctetsReceived.description: Number of (IP) octets received by BCM.

bcmIpFramesReturned.name: bcmIpFramesReturned
bcmIpFramesReturned.description: Number of (IP) frames not managed by BCM and returned to BUS for transmission.

bcmIpOctetsReturned.name: bcmIpOctetsReturned
bcmIpOctetsReturned.description: Number of (IP) octets not managed by BCM and returned to BUS for transmission.

bcmIpFramesDiscarded.name: bcmIpFramesDiscarded
bcmIpFramesDiscarded.description: Number of (IP) frames discarded (filtered) by BCM.

bcmIpOctetsDiscarded.name: bcmIpOctetsDiscarded
bcmIpOctetsDiscarded.description: Number of (IP) octets discarded (filtered) by BCM.

bcmIpFramesTransmitted.name: bcmIpFramesTransmitted
bcmIpFramesTransmitted.description: Number of (IP) frames transmitted by BCM.

bcmIpOctetsTransmitted.name: bcmIpOctetsTransmitted
bcmIpOctetsTransmitted.description: Number of (IP) octets transmitted by BCM.

bcmIpTransmitErrorFrames.name: bcmIpTransmitErrorFrames
bcmIpTransmitErrorFrames.description: Number of (IP) frames that the BCM could not sent due to an error.

bcmIpTransmitErrorOctets.name: bcmIpTransmitErrorOctets
bcmIpTransmitErrorOctets.description: Number of (IP) octets that the BCM could not sent due to an error.

bcmIpBroadcastFramesDirectedNoRif.name: bcmIpBroadcastFramesDirectedNoRif
bcmIpBroadcastFramesDirectedNoRif.description: Number of (IP) frames transmitted by BCM with no RI Field.

bcmIpBroadcastFramesDirectedAre.name: bcmIpBroadcastFramesDirectedAre
bcmIpBroadcastFramesDirectedAre.description: Number of (IP) frames transmitted by BCM left as ARE.

bcmIpBroadcastFramesDirectedSte.name: bcmIpBroadcastFramesDirectedSte
bcmIpBroadcastFramesDirectedSte.description: Number of (IP) frames transmitted by BCM left as STE.

bcmIpBroadcastFramesDirectedSrf.name: bcmIpBroadcastFramesDirectedSrf
bcmIpBroadcastFramesDirectedSrf.description: Number of (IP) frames transmitted by BCM that were converted from ARE or STE to SRF by Source Route Management, or left as SRF multicast frame (a rare frame type).

bcmIpxStatTable.name: bcmIpxStatTable
bcmIpxStatTable.description: Each entry in this table contains the counters for the IPX operation of a BCM. The table augments the bcmStatTable.

bcmIpxStatEntry.name: bcmIpxStatEntry
bcmIpxStatEntry.description: Each entry in this table contains the counters for the IPX operation of a BCM. The table augments the bcmStatTable.

bcmIpxFramesReceived.name: bcmIpxFramesReceived
bcmIpxFramesReceived.description: Number of (IPX) frames received by BCM.

bcmIpxOctetsReceived.name: bcmIpxOctetsReceived
bcmIpxOctetsReceived.description: Number of (IPX) octets received by BCM.

bcmIpxFramesReturned.name: bcmIpxFramesReturned
bcmIpxFramesReturned.description: Number of (IPX) frames not managed by BCM and returned to BUS for transmission.

bcmIpxOctetsReturned.name: bcmIpxOctetsReturned
bcmIpxOctetsReturned.description: Number of (IPX) octets not managed by BCM and returned to BUS for transmission.

bcmIpxFramesDiscarded.name: bcmIpxFramesDiscarded
bcmIpxFramesDiscarded.description: Number of (IPX) frames discarded (filtered) by BCM.

bcmIpxOctetsDiscarded.name: bcmIpxOctetsDiscarded
bcmIpxOctetsDiscarded.description: Number of (IPX) octets discarded (filtered) by BCM.

bcmIpxFramesTransmitted.name: bcmIpxFramesTransmitted
bcmIpxFramesTransmitted.description: Number of (IPX) frames transmitted by BCM.

bcmIpxOctetsTransmitted.name: bcmIpxOctetsTransmitted
bcmIpxOctetsTransmitted.description: Number of (IPX) octets transmitted by BCM.

bcmIpxTransmitErrorFrames.name: bcmIpxTransmitErrorFrames
bcmIpxTransmitErrorFrames.description: Number of (IPX) frames that the BCM could not sent due to an error.

bcmIpxTransmitErrorOctets.name: bcmIpxTransmitErrorOctets
bcmIpxTransmitErrorOctets.description: Number of (IPX) octets that the BCM could not sent due to an error.

bcmIpxBroadcastFramesDirectedNoRif.name: bcmIpxBroadcastFramesDirectedNoRif
bcmIpxBroadcastFramesDirectedNoRif.description: Frame sent on one VCC, no RIF in them.

bcmIpxBroadcastFramesDirectedAre.name: bcmIpxBroadcastFramesDirectedAre
bcmIpxBroadcastFramesDirectedAre.description: Number of (IPX) frames transmitted by BCM left as ARE.

bcmIpxBroadcastFramesDirectedSte.name: bcmIpxBroadcastFramesDirectedSte
bcmIpxBroadcastFramesDirectedSte.description: Number of (IPX) frames transmitted by BCM left as STE.

bcmIpxBroadcastFramesDirectedSrf.name: bcmIpxBroadcastFramesDirectedSrf
bcmIpxBroadcastFramesDirectedSrf.description: Number of (IPX) frames transmitted by BCM that were converted from ARE or STE to SRF by Source Route Management, or left as SRF multicast frame (a rare frame type).

bcmNbStatTable.name: bcmNbStatTable
bcmNbStatTable.description: Each entry in this table contains the counters for the NetBIOS operation of a BCM. The table augments the bcmStatTable.

bcmNbStatEntry.name: bcmNbStatEntry
bcmNbStatEntry.description: Each entry in this table contains the counters for the NetBIOS operation of a BCM. The table augments the bcmStatTable.

bcmNbFramesReceived.name: bcmNbFramesReceived
bcmNbFramesReceived.description: Number of (NetBIOS) frames received by BCM.

bcmNbOctetsReceived.name: bcmNbOctetsReceived
bcmNbOctetsReceived.description: Number of (NetBIOS) octets received by BCM.

bcmNbFramesReturned.description: Number of (NetBIOS) frames not managed by BCM and returned to BUS for transmission.

bcmNbFramesDiscarded.description: Number of (NetBIOS) frames discarded (filtered) by BCM.

bcmNbOctetsDiscarded.name: bcmNbOctetsDiscarded
bcmNbOctetsDiscarded.description: Number of (NetBIOS) octets discarded (filtered) by BCM.

bcmNbFramesTransmitted.name: bcmNbFramesTransmitted
bcmNbFramesTransmitted.description: Number of (NetBIOS) frames transmitted by BCM.

bcmNbOctetsTransmitted.name: bcmNbOctetsTransmitted
bcmNbOctetsTransmitted.description: Number of (NetBIOS) octets transmitted by BCM.

bcmNbTransmitErrorFrames.name: bcmNbTransmitErrorFrames
bcmNbTransmitErrorFrames.description: Number of (NetBIOS) frames that the BCM could not sent due to an error.

bcmNbTransmitErrorOctets.description: Number of (NetBIOS) octets that the BCM could not sent due to an error.

bcmNbBroadcastFramesDirectedNoRif.description: Number of (NetBIOS) frames transmitted by BCM with no RI Field.

bcmNbBroadcastFramesDirectedAre.name: bcmNbBroadcastFramesDirectedAre
bcmNbBroadcastFramesDirectedAre.description: Number of (NetBIOS) frames transmitted by BCM left as ARE.
